name: Jewel Match Solitaire
description:
Take a fantastical journey across the kingdom in this beautiful new Solitaire adventure! Travel across an ancient land rebuilding epic castles of old.

Over 200 levels in all, plus many Solitaire variants including Klondike, Spider, Freecell, Pyramid, and more! Dozens of unique game play variations mix up the classic Solitaire such as locked and frozen cards, obstacles to remove like vines and wax seals, and many power-ups like wild cards, jokers, and shuffles.

Search every last level for gems and coins to purchase new castle upgrades and power-ups. Jewel Match Solitaire is the ultimate relaxing Solitaire game!

Features:
  • 200 Solitaire levels!
  • 12 variants such as Klondike, Spider, Freecell and Pyramid Solitaire.
  • 5 beautiful castles to build and set them as desktop wallpapers!
  • Tons of gameplay variations and power-ups.
  • 3 different playmodes: relaxed, normal, hard.
  • Dozens of trophies to achieve.
  • Choose from several card decks.
  • Beautifully relaxing soundtrack.
